entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023
